channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Who needs Graphviz when you can build it yourself?
item.description:
You can play with these graphs right here on this page. The first problem is that the Graphviz output rarely bears any resemblance to the source code that produced it. Since this graph mirrors JavaScript control flow, we’d expect to see the return at the bottom.

Read more

item.title: SpiderMonkey Garbage Collector
item.description:
SpiderMonkey SpiderMonkey garbage collector Report an issue / View page source SpiderMonkey garbage collector The SpiderMonkey garbage collector is responsible for allocating memory representing JavaScript data structures and deallocating them when they are no longer in use. As far as possible the SpiderMonkey collector runs incrementally. The SpiderMonkey collector performs work within GC slices in parallel wherever possible.

Read more
